author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Government of India has extended the deadline for joining the pension scheme ‘Atal Pension Yojana’ (APY) introduced for the benefit of workers in unorganised sector, to March 31.

Under the APY, the Central Government will co-contribute 50 per cent of the total contribution or Rs.1,000 whichever is lower, to each eligible subscriber account for a period of 5 years, i.e., from financial year 2015-16 to 2019-20, who joins the scheme before December 31. After considering the feedbacks received from various quarters, the Governemnt has extended the deadline to March 3,1 a release from Department of Financial Services of the Union Finance Ministry said.
title: Deadline extended for Atal Pension Scheme
